text: bayehachewimi gize akalochachewi (gizufinetachewi) yasidenik’uhali፡፡ binagerumi lenigigirachewi tadamit’alehi፤ (ke‘iwik’eti bado bemehoni)፡፡ inerisu liki begidigida yetet’egu ginidochini yimesilalu፡፡ ch’uhetini hulu be’inerisu layi newi bilewi yasibalu፡፡ inerisu t’elatochi nachewina tet’enik’ek’achewi፡፡ alahi yigadelachewi፤ (ke’imineti) inideti yimelesalu
